Move on along the accustomed ways, and as thou ehangest season by season the courses of the twelve even-moving Signs in heaven, bear them along in headlong career with unceasing revolutions, thyself so carried onwards by the steep- sloping heavenj that Phoebus may begin to reverse his motions ere all your days are spent,1a11d through winter's impulse may restore his fires anew. While thrice ten times the horned moon returns new born, thy hand shall bring round in succession dawn and eve, still keeping Phoebus to his ordained course amid the signs of heaven.
